text: janara paiki yahudigalu mattu bahudevaradhakaru visvasigala virud'dha heccu satrutva ullavaragiruvudannu nivu kanuviri. Hageye ‘‘navu kraistaru’’ endu heluvavarannu nivu visvasigala jote heccina sneha ullavaragi kanuviri. Idekendare avara naduve nisvartha dharma sevakaru hagu sadhugaliddare mattu avaru ahankara paduvavaralla
